Wolphmaniac wins!
Curses, Goons, Spies, and Cities are all gone.

cards in supply: Bishop, City, Fortune Teller, Goons, Harem, Island, Masquerade, Quarry, Remake, and Spy
Default card selection was used.  The point tracker will be available.
----------------------

#1 Wolphmaniac: 140 points (148 ▼, an Island, and 10 Curses); 15 turns
             opening: Quarry / Masquerade
             [42 cards] 10 Spies, 8 Cities, 7 Goons, 3 Quarries, 1 Island, 1 Masquerade, 2 Coppers, 10 Curses

#2 shweppes: 14 points (9 ▼, 2 Islands, and an Estate); 14 turns
          opening: Bishop / Silver
          [22 cards] 3 Goons, 2 Cities, 2 Islands, 2 Masquerades, 1 Bishop, 1 Quarry, 7 Coppers, 3 Silvers, 1 Estate

----------------------

trash: 5 Estates and 5 Coppers
